ratings.comment: Tseng is the man!! Best math class Ive ever taken. He makes it super easy to pass his class, but while also teaching you the material. Its not like an easy A, but his humor and personality make Abstract Algebra actually interesting. Do whatever it takes to get into his class. You wont regret it

I thought he was a pretty decent professor until I took the final exam.  The exam was not fair and did not reflect any of the material we had learned during the semester.  Be prepared for anything because he will probably change the final for the next class.

I thought he was a pretty decent professor...until I took his final yesterday, which was absolutely ridiculous. It was not a fair assessment of what we had learned in class, and I'm sure everybody bombed it. I'm sure he made it extra hard, since everybody did really well on the second midterm. He's a very unfair professor.

I agreed with the comments from the previous raters; then I took the final and everything changed. The final this semester was completely insane. While the midterms had straightforward problems from the HW, the final had problems you'd never even seen before. It wasn't fair; there were no indications that the exam would leave 100 students in shock.

Well..i would say he is really a good prof.He speaks clearly and comprehensible.The homework and quiz are pretty easy. The exams are short and reasonable. I would recommend him to anyone who would like to take Math213.

He's a really good prof. He's very articulate and clear and he can be really funny. Definitely go to the lectures. Homework is really short and easy! Quizes every now and then in discussion sections are easy too. Exams are pretty short and reasonable.
